content: skill level | beginner finished size | 2 5-3″ diameter includes tutorial if you re looking for a quick an easy way to add a finishing touch to a project our beginner crochet rose is a great option it works up in less than 30 minutes with only 30 yards of yarn with this project you ll learn one basic method of crocheting a flower which involves crocheting in row rolling it and securing it into shape they re great to stitch onto a project or hot glue on a stem with floral tape to make a unique bouquet of crochet roses pdf also available for purchase
